detailsData.title: Expert Advice
detailsData.content: Our team of former big-firm lawyers provides clients with expert, innovative and practical advice.

detailsData.title: Nimble Approach
detailsData.content: We are nimble, creative and cost-effective when approaching complex legal transactions.

detailsData.title: Client Value
detailsData.content: We offer cutting-edge legal tools and effective solutions for clients looking to maximize value.

valueProp: Carter West is a progressive, boutique law firm committed to providing clients with expert, innovative and practical advice.
CTA: to call or text the contact number for a consultation

testimonalData.text: Ashley offers not only excellent legal advice, she has developed a professional relationship with Green Earth Products and more important, its principles.
testimonalData.author: Alan Magat

testimonalData.text: We used Ian to help us sell a major division of O1 Communications to a private equity-backed buyer. Ian's ability to see the big picture was integral to our success in the transaction.
testimonalData.author: Jim Beausoleil

testimonalData.text: Ashley West is heavily invested in her clients and the community. She is an excellent listener, expert practitioner, and tireless worker.
testimonalData.author: Ellen Warner
testimonalData.location: Vice President, Development, Golden State Warriors
